mkc.description: Creates a new class. Usage: mkc <class_name>

aa.description: Adds an attribute to a class. Usage: aa <class_name> <attribute>

am.description: Adds a method to a class with optional overloading. Usage: am <class_name> <method_name> <parameter>

raa.description: Removes an attribute from a class. Usage: raa <class_name> <attribute>

rmm.description: Removes a method from a class. Usage: rmm <class_name> <method_name> <parameter>

ar.description:
Adds or updates a relationship in a class. Usage: ar <class_name> <relationship_type(1-4)>, where:
 1: Association
 2: Aggregation
 3: Composition
 4: Inheritance

rmr.description: Removes a relationship from a class. Usage: rmr <class_name>
